title: Looking for ranked team ( ^ω^ ) ♥
body:
The past few weeks I've been playing some ranked and I'm honestly just tired of getting flamers and toxic players in my game ;~; 
I find it hard to climb by myself but I'm sure with the help of 4 others, it would make it easier. We can sort out which roles and champions we're all good at and build an awesome team comp together and hopefully climb a lot easier. I at least want to reach Silver V before the season ends! :3

I've been playing league for maybe a year+ now and only recently have I thought about getting into ranked more seriously. I main mid and support (mostly kat and naut), I can play top and jungle too. I'm not so great with ADC but I can practice that in norms and customs. So basically, I'm looking for anyone who can top, mid, jungle and adc :3 Since I know a lot of people out there hate playing support, I'd gladly fill that role in but would like mid here and there too. Currently B3, which is why I'm finding it so difficult to climb on my own. 

I can usually play after 5 - 6pm on Mondays - Thursdays and anytime on Fridays - Sundays if nothings going on. Let me know which roles you main, rank isn't necessary since I mean cmon I'm bronze 3. Thanks! ^.^

replies.body: Just tell me when you get around to doing so
I main supp best champs are blitz, janna, alistar and morgana

heyy :3

Im interested in joining the team if possible! I agree with you 100% the flamers are to much to handle  ;_; I main support {{champion:40}}  {{champion:89}} {{champion:412}} {{champion:25}}  and I can also play mid {{champion:103}}  {{champion:61}} {{champion:112}}  
Please let me know if you need me for the team, As I would LOVE to join! :)
IGN: Natsu298

Hai :3

I can fill any role (not so much support :P) but im a main ADC and would love to join a team. ive been playing for 4 years now and I can agree Seras Dragon that ranked doesn't really get that much better, even at Gold 1 I still get flamers and toxic players. 

i would love to form a ranked team with others :D

IGN: NEON Skybax
(i wish you luck in solo queue, i know the pains of getting out of bronze....)

>

> I can fill any role (not so much support :P) but im a main ADC and would love to join a team. ive been playing for 4 years now and I can agree Seras Dragon that ranked doesn't really get that much better, even at Gold 1 I still get flamers and toxic players.

> (i wish you luck in solo queue, i know the pains of getting out of bronze....)

Great! Not many ADC's have commented ;n; I'll add you when I get home and I'll create a group chat to sort out the team :)
hey, i'm looking for a team as well. I can play any lane just fine but so far supp and jungle is the best. Add me if you want to create a team together
I'm keen for a team. I main top {{champion:150}}  or really anyone and jungle {{champion:60}}. Just give me a shout if you want a team.

> [{quoted}](name=Llama Mime,realm=OCE,application-id=mR0UmRrp,discussion-id=eEyTls41,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-10-19T07:41:10.119+0000)
>
> I'm keen for a team. I main top {{champion:150}}  or really anyone and jungle {{champion:60}}. Just give me a shout if you want a team.

I'll add you when I get home ! ^_^

Well I main Supp {{champion:267}} but can also jng fairly competently with {{champion:57}} . Second supps would be {{champion:117}} {{champion:43}}, Jngs would be {{champion:33}} {{champion:421}} and I'm planning to get some good time in on {{champion:203}} after next patch when things settle down a bit for her. I'm Gold V at present (stopped cause I mostly just wanted the rewards) and mostly want a team to get the ward skin, but I'd be happy to play with you. My only rule is if it's not fun I won't play :) 

I've been playing for three years now (boy has it really been that long), first year seriously playing ranked though and I gotta tell you, ranked doesn't get much better, so long as you don't get unfortunately stuck in B5 the toxic doesn't get much better/worse (though the higher you go the better the skill at least....generally) so teams are a great alternative. My advice, remember it's a game and you're there to have fun (but still take it a little more seriously than norms), and especially if you start this late, don't expect to get very far before season ends, just consider it an experience in getting better at the game :)

Add me bro, I play all lanes accept support. Can kindred, Irelia Jg and currently learning more. Ahri and veigar mid learning LB. Aatrox, Irelia top as well. Ashe, trust Adc. Basically all but support.
Hey need a jungler adc or support? Add me if so :)

Im down to join Im a mid main {{champion:157}} {{champion:7}} {{champion:55}}  (if not banned)
I can fill any role to a moderate standard preferably not support because i find that role quite boring but if needed i can support.
My play style can be very passive however if im assassin i tend to go on the aggressive side
My main initiative is to play for fun and get some season rewards hoping to improve mechanics, and being a better player in general
